text: All the gold that was used for the work in all the work of the sanctuary, even the gold of the offering, was twenty-nine talents38:24 A talent is about 30 kilograms or 66 pounds or 965 Troy ounces. and seven hundred thirty shekels, according to the shekel38:24 A shekel is about 10 grams or about 0.32 Troy ounces. of the sanctuary.
